sentence.Network_en: The mood changes abruptly after six or seven bars of wayward decrescendo.
sentence.Network_cn: 六七个小节长时间的渐弱之后,音乐的情绪陡然改变了.

sentence.Network_en: Ejection murmurs begin after S 1 and are usually crescendo - decrescendo ( diamond - shaped'), ending before S 2.
sentence.Network_cn: 喷射音始于S1后,通常有渐强 - 渐弱特征, 并于S2前结束.

sentence.Network_en: A decrescendo brings the music back to almost spooky piano within the next two bars.
sentence.Network_cn: 在之后的两小节,一段减弱音将音乐带回到幽灵般的钢琴声中.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 音乐符号大全 - 已解决 - 搜搜问问 ... decresc. 渐弱 Decrescendo 渐弱 dim Diminuendo 渐弱.
减弱(Decrescendo) 与渐强相反自然音阶(Diatonic) 自然音阶上的每一个音调都有两个簧片分别对应不同的音高。风箱的伸缩方向对发生哪一个音起着决定作用。若需.
递增型递增型(crescendo) (crescendo)   递减型递减型(decrescendo) (decrescendo)   递递增递减增递减 (crescendo (crescendo--decrescendo) decrescendo).
decresc.同上。decrescendo〔意〕渐弱。decrescendo sin al pianissimo〔意〕渐弱至很弱。.

auth_sentence.content: This epic monologuist's long decrescendo is re-created in gaudy, illuminating detail by many of its witnesses.
